sentence: Mike Brown; Kent County businesswoman Donna Brandenburg; Oakland County pastor Ralph Rebandt; Ottawa County real estate agent Ryan Kelley; Livingston County evangelist and substitute teacher Bob Scott; Lansing businessman Evan Space; and Grand Rapids entrepreneur and U.S. Army veteran Austin Chenge.
author: Paul Egan
title: 'Quality guru' Perry Johnson joins crowded Republican race for Michigan governor

author: Paul Egan
title: Michigan's primary ballot may be 'disaster' for GOP candidates for governor, expert says

sentence: Mike Brown; businesswomen Donna Brandeburg and Tudor Dixon; businessman Perry Johnson; real estate agent Ryan Kelley; financial advisor Michael Markey; pastor Ralph Rebandt, businessman Kevin Rinke; and chiropractor Garrett Soldano.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Meatgrinder' GOP Gov. primary in Michigan will leave nominee broke, bloodied, and disliked': expert

sentence: Craig is the current frontrunner in the Republican primary, but the primary field is packed with other candidates, including chiropractor Garrett Soldano, businessman Perry Johnson, real estate broker and activist Ryan Kelley, conservative commentator Tudor Dixon, and former car dealership owner Kevin Rinke.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: Michigan Democrat Gretchen Whitmer Trails Republican on Generic Ballot for Governor's Race

sentence: Those qualifying for the ballot would be Dixon, a former conservative TV news host who netted the DeVos family endorsement earlier Monday; chiropractor and grass-roots activist Garrett Soldano; wealthy self-funding businessman Kevin Rinke; real estate broker and anti-coronavirus lockdown activist Ryan Kelley; and pastor Ralph Rebandt.
author: DAVID EGGERT
title: Primary problem: Michigan GOP governor candidates short signatures
